notes: This is a template configuration file.
Copy this file to user_config.json and customize with your preferences.
Never commit user_config.json to version control - it's already in .gitignore.
The parser uses generic patterns by default and doesn't require specific account numbers.
Account identification is done automatically from PDF content when possible.

privacy_notice: This configuration contains optional customization settings. The parser works with generic placeholders by default to protect your privacy.
